verbose_text: Wild-type BCL11A-L produced a ~ 2.5-fold activation of reporter transcription, an effect that was significantly reduced for all three mutant isoforms (p < 0.05, one-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni post hoc test; XREF_FIG D).
evidence: Wild-type BCL11A-L produced a ~2.5-fold activation of reporter transcription
